data.text:
New York: Harper & Row, 1974. First Edition; First Printing. Hardcover. Item #43829

ISBN: 0060109440

Very Good in a Very Good dust jacket. Large owner inscription to FEP. Minor damp staining. Stated First Edition. Anthology includes authors Isaac Bashevis Singer, Robert Sheckley, Bernard Malamud, Pamela Sargent, George Alec Effinger, Harlan Ellison, Robert Silverberg, and others. ; 1.1 x 8.4 x 5.6 Inches; 239 pages.

Price: $50.90 save 20% $40.72

USED
